posts.title: We Need More Black Artists In Alternative Rock
posts.content: Alternative rock is a genre of music that is very niche in the white community but a lot of underground black artists are venturing to that genre. Ravyn Lenae is one such artist.
posts.author: Wambui Kibathi

posts.title: A Journey Through Code
posts.content: Exploring the vast world of programming one line at a time
posts.author: Octavio Spencer

posts.title: Exploring the Hidden Gems of Nairobi National Park
posts.content: Did you know that Nairobi is the only capital city in the world with a national park? Only in Africa!
posts.author: Miller Franc
